name: Block Stacker: Turbo Alpha Edition
description:
Really early build. Still really janky and in need of a lot of polish. Not sure if I'd go ahead and do that. I just want to consider this 'done' for now so I can move onto other projects. 

Feedback is welcomed.

Known major bugs: 

  • Music doesn't resume after Game Over. Must go back to menu and hit reset for that.

---

So you have to specify the author in your project:
Music from https://filmmusic.io
